body.p: You can use your own terminology databases or dictionaries in using the SGML-based exchange format. You must add SGML tags to the file containing your database or dictionary to make it compatible with .

dictionaries can also be converted into other formats. You first export them as external dictionaries and then replace the SGML tags with the appropriate coding. Outside , the dictionaries can be copied on a diskette or any other media for distribution.

dictionaries can also be distributed as part of a folder. This is convenient for copyright-protected dictionaries that can only be transferred from one workstation to another using the folder export and import procedures.
